name: Starshift (gimwongyeong, yasminhaq, Abudi3600)
description:
Synopsis:

Survive for as long as you can in Starshift, a 2D action-rhythm game developed by Starshifters. Avoid enemies and obstacles as you shift between the Positive Dimension and the Negative Dimension. Threats in one dimension can't hurt you while you're in the other, but there is one limitation:  you can't control when you shift dimensions, the game's music does!

This game was created by three students for the Texas Game Jam 2022 hosted by the Electronic Game Developers Society (EGaDS!) at The University of Texas at Austin.

Controls: Move:WASD or Arrow KeysStart game:Click on "Start" at the menu screenQuit game:Alt+F4 Credits: Developer:StarshiftersProgramming, Music, Audio:Abdullah AlwakeelArt, Animation, UI/UX:Yasmin HaqProduction, Design:Chris Kim
